system.description: Effect: On hit, the target has a 20% chance of losing -1 SPD stages for 5 activations. If the Target is @Affliction[grapple] by the user, Constrict may be used as a Simple Action instead, and gains [Danger Close].

actions.name: Constrict
actions.description: Effect: On hit, the target has a 20% chance of losing -1 SPD stages for 5 activations. If the Target is @Affliction[grapple] by the user, Constrict may be used as a Simple Action instead, and gains [Danger Close].
